short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly disable and enable installed extensions and apps. Whitelist items to remain unaffected.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use keyboard command Ctrl + Shift + E.

Visit homepage for more: https://browsernative.com/disable-chrome-extensions-apps/
